website_summaries.verdict: The best way to keep eyeshadow bold and bright all day long.
pros: Primer keeps eyeshadow from creasing and fading throughout the day
Keeps cream-based eyeshadow firmly in place
Primer glides on smooth and provides protection from water and smudges
Eyeshadow blends easily on top of primer
cons: Be sure to shake up before using

customer_reviews.title: FAKE. Not the real Too Faced!!! DON’T BUY.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used the real product for years. Ordered this for the cheap price (retails for $20 at Ulta). Noticed the product was a bit runny, resulting in creases after applying, which is highly unusual for this product. Seemed pretty sketchy, so I bought a real Too Faced Primer from Ulta for comparison, which is the tube on the right. As you can see, the fake one on the left (from this Amazon seller) is a pretty good fake, except it’s missing the logo on the top of the lid. Difficult to see here, but the top is also shorter on the fake.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: This brand is great but buy it elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for a number of years. When I opened this one, I noticed the tip was different but assumed new packaging, no big deal. Then the consistency of the cream was also different. After wearing it a few times, it was proving that it completely didn’t work. I thought they must have changed the formula what a bummer. On a whim I went into ULTA and guess what? Their product is just like my previous experiences. Notice even the tip difference? Definitely has me wondering what’s going on. It also won’t allow me to return it. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Knock off!!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought the Too Face Shadow Primer from Amazon before, but this one is not the same product at all. It's super watery, thin and completely useless as a shadow primer. I'm so disappointed. I added photos so you can see the difference in quality and in the packaging. In the photos, the top is this crappy knockoff and the bottom is the real deal. The real product has a nice thick consistency that goes on much like a concealer and gives a great base for eyeshadow to stick to. This knockoff is nothing like that at all. Amazon also would not allow a return on this product so I'm out $20. Don't buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: FireWalkWithMe

customer_reviews.title: Product smells old, dries out eyelids and flakes off
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if I received an outdated item but it smells stale. It feels greasy at first but once applied to my eyelid it became super dry , creased, and made my eye shadow flake off. I'm trying to return it but for whatever reason it says it's not eligible to return. I will purchase from Ulta or Sephora for now on - they accept returns.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years and have always relied upon it’s effectiveness to keep my eye liner where I put it.... Now, with this last purchase my eye makeup smudges, transfer of liner on my eyelids and I am out $25! Really disappointed at what has happened to the product line. Sad....as I’m not cheap with making quality makeup purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Rorie Steiding

customer_reviews.title: best shadow primer on the market
customer_reviews.text: its hydrating - so its not like layering foundation or a concealer that it becomes too many layers or cakey / gummy I also use it on my nose - esp the tip if its going to be a cold weather day and I need my makeup to last and my nose is usually the first thing to start to wear off. Im from Texas so its humid This is the perfect primer for shadow and my nose that its as a cushion to hold on to what you layer over it I own 10 tubes!! LOVE !!!
customer_reviews.author: K. K. Schiller

customer_reviews.title: Best product I've used.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this eyeshadow primer for years. I've tried many different types before this but I've never found anything better than this one. One tube lasts a few months for me and I do my makeup daily. I apply a tiny bit (that's all you need) to a qtip and use the qtip to put it on my eyelids. Let it fully dry and apply your eyeshadow as normal. It lasts all day long on my eyes, it doesn't matter what I do, my eyeshadow stays put until I take my makeup off.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria M

customer_reviews.title: This does not seem like the same primer I’ve used in the past
customer_reviews.text: This does not seem like the same primer I’ve used in the past. The other Shadow Insurance I’ve used before has helped my shadow stay on all day. This is greasy right out of the tube and makes my makeup crease almost immediately. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: IsaacFank

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: Either the formula has changed or this is not the genuine product. It does not hold eye shadow at all, and actually it makes my lids look oily. Do not buy. I will be purchasing this product from Ulta instead.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed. I use such a tiny amount on my kids, the tube will probably last me quite a while. I do my makeup around 5;30am, and work a busy 10 hour shift. I usually perspire a little, and my shadow would always be worn out by days end. With this product, I need to use eye makeup remover, or a good cleanser to get my shadow off before bed. That's 16 hours of perfect looking eyes! Highly recommend this primer for your eye makeup.
customer_reviews.author: HmSkillit

customer_reviews.title: FAKE
customer_reviews.text: If I could give zero stars I would, because this is a complete fake. I thought it looked slightly off when I looked at the tube. And the formula had a different color/texture. I had purchased this before at a sephora store and loved it. But what I purchased here is definitely not the same. My eyeshadow would crease with the fake. I just ordered a new tube from sephora's website. Save yourself the money and purchase from an actual beauty store.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Jodrey

customer_reviews.title: May cause irritation to sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: UGH! I'm bummed. On the plus side, as a primer, it did its job! My eyeshadow didn't crease, my eyeliner didn't transfer to my upper lids, and my color stayed put and beautifully blended for 10 hours before I washed it off. It applied smoothly and didn't dry out my lids or crepe. The problem? My eyes are swollen and itchy the morning after using this. It's probably the talc, which I'm often (though not 100% of the time) sensitive, too. So if you're sensitive, like me, this may not cause you irritation. So sad cuz I love how well it works!!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy this from Ulta, ever since I started using this primer... my eye shadow is BOLD and stays put all day. No creasing, no grease, and it doesn’t budge when I sweat/cry/it rains. I SWEAR by this stuff, it’s changed my makeup game completely.
customer_reviews.author: Okami Amaterasu/LittleShyKitten77

customer_reviews.title: Pretty greasy
customer_reviews.text: This product does not seem to be like those I have bought from stores. It seems much greasier with way too much oil that is not mixing with the rest of the product. It's so oily that it is making my makeup come off faster. So be fair, it seemed to separate out more over time.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Works all day for me. Easy to use and only need a very small amount. The seller offered a discount and I was extremely happy so I bought two. The product shipped overnight. I would definitely purchase this product and from this supplier again. The product that arrived was exactly as shown when I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A miracle worker.
customer_reviews.text: A miracle in a tube. Used it almost everyday for a year and is still over half-full. I would build a shrine to this primer if that were a thing. I live in TX and this stuff deserves all the glory for keeping me feelin’ s’cute everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Sdupreebemis

customer_reviews.title: Soooo bomb!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this eyeshadow primer ! It makes the colors so vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: KyhaBoo

customer_reviews.title: this stuff is AWESOME. it helps my eyeshadow stay on all day
customer_reviews.text: this stuff is AWESOME. it helps my eyeshadow stay on all day, even the cheaper eyeshadows that usually rub off really quickly. i love it! it surprised me at first how much stayed on, and the first few times i used this primer, i put on WAY TOO MUCH eyeshadow, because i was used to a lot of it kind of falling off or blending away, but this makes it stay put. i would highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: JenniLynn

customer_reviews.title: This came in watery. Normally I buy this product ...
customer_reviews.text: This came in watery. Normally I buy this product at ULTA. I gave it away and went to ULTA. I think it has been sitting in storage too long and the contents settled making it watery. Going to sick to ULTA
customer_reviews.author: Sonia C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! I love this stuff, best eye primer I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: For the amount you get, it feels expensive to me, however! It solved completely, the issue of eyeshadow creasing!!! It lasts all day, until I was it off. It was packaged just fine. I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Shockency

customer_reviews.title: Great product for eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I do not profess to be good at makeup. I don't have the patience to spend more than 10 minutes on it. That being said, this product is great for what I need. I wear it daily to keep my eyeliner on and it keeps it pretty for the 14+ hours I need it, even with a cat eye. I Would recommend this to the casual makeup wearer.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good primer, sheer
customer_reviews.text: If you only want to prime your lids for shadow and are not concerned about any coverage, this is the primer for you. It dries matte quickly and it does a great job of keeping your shadows on for hours. I do notice some creasing after around 4-5 hours, BUT ...I do have oily lids and I'm sure that those who don't have this problem can get more hours of creaseless wear out of it. After using this up I'm afraid I won't repurchase, I will look for a primer that stands up better against my oily lids and also provides some coverage for discoloration.
customer_reviews.author: W. yuan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The product was was separated when it came out of the tube. I attempted to mix it before applying but it did not help. Did not provide coverage on the eyelid. Unfortunately I was unable to return the item so I just waisted my money with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing it works with any brand of shades and makes them last all day and night. One is enough for up to 6 months of daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Works like magic!
customer_reviews.text: I have hooded eye lids and couldn't keep eye liner on my lids. This really works! Eye shadow and liner stay on all day! I'll continue to purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Works Extremely Well!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this eye shadow primer. What a difference it makes. My eye shadow used to crease after a few hours but with this primer it’s as nice at night when I’m about to wash it off as it was when I put it on in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: SandyB

customer_reviews.title: Shadow Lasts All Day
customer_reviews.text: This is great for getting your shadow to last all day, or avoiding that oily feel/shiny look if you choose to skip shadow. My shadow lasts until I wash it off at night. If I don't want to do full makeup, I will still put this on my lids for a matte look and feel that lasts all day but looks natural. I've been using this for a few years now, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle G.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. This must be a fake
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. This must be a fake. I've bought this primer in the past and it was much, much thicker. This is like melted ice cream. Does not work at all so save your money. No wonder it's not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Reccomended!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Used it for the first time yesterday. I put it on and did my eyeliner a lot thicker and more dramatic than usual and it stayed on very well! I even watched a sad movie and cried a little and it didn't run down my face hahaha. Now that's a test, and it passed ;)
customer_reviews.author: amyshx09

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This eye primer is amazing. I am very picky about eye primer. My favorite in the past has been Mary Kay's eye primer, but I think this one might beat it. It's a neutral color so you can't see that it's on your eye like some other primers. It dries quickly and man does it hold the eye shadow in place! By the end of the day my eye makeup looks exactly the same. The only warning is that it holds it in place so well you need to be careful because blending isn't easy once it sets. I make sure to cover the entire lid with a neutral shadow first to make blending easier later.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Keilman

customer_reviews.title: The real deal
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for over 5 years now. I have tried other brands and will always go back to this brand. It is by far the best primer out there! I did indeed get the real product. This was not a fake or a knock off, just to make note!
customer_reviews.author: Kate G.

customer_reviews.title: Stops the eye shadow creasing!
customer_reviews.text: This really works to keep your eye shadow in place and stop it from creasing. A tiny bit goes a long way. Without it my eye shadow is creased in no time! I won't use eye shadow without it!
customer_reviews.author: valerie ashley

customer_reviews.title: I don't get what all the fuss is about....
customer_reviews.text: I heard really good things about this primer and I wanted to find something to help my make up last. I purchased this. It didn't work for me. I still get creases in my eye shadow. It extending the wear of my make up maybe an additional 2 hours. It does last longer than my make up does without it, but not enough to justify spending money on something that doesn't extend my make up for more than 2 hours. I will not be purchasing this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: The item I received does not even look like this!
customer_reviews.text: This is a counterfeit item! The item I received does not even look like this!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why everyone loves this so much. I can’t see a difference than just putting moisturizer on lids. It’s just so so
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 10/10, best eyeshadow primer I've used
customer_reviews.text: This has been my favorite eyeshadow primer so far. It isnt heavy or particularly gunky if I don't gob it on.
customer_reviews.author: Hadlie Rose

customer_reviews.title: Always my go to!
customer_reviews.text: Tried everything out there but this is hands down the best holding power and zero break out if use on face too!
customer_reviews.author: Richard K

customer_reviews.title: Lasts long without running
customer_reviews.text: I tried a different primers but this one when I was hot, I work in a bakery, would not run or melt. It lasts over 24 hours and still looks good and it washes off with soap and water. It's my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Cocoa Bakes

customer_reviews.title: So much better than Urban Decay's Primer Potion!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I didn't even know this product existed until I was shopping for a refill of Urban Decay's Primer Potion. I decided to give this one a try because of other good reviews on Amazon and on Sephora. This is an excellent primer - you really only need a very tiny amount and the tube will last a long time. It goes on smooth and blends quickly. It is not as watered down as Urban Decay. The tube design is far superior as well to Urban Decay, you won't feel like you wasted your money because you can get all the product out. I will buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: misseattle

customer_reviews.title: Fake. Not the original product.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this stuff for years and now bought it from this seller. It does not work AT ALL. This doesn't seem to be the original product because the original product keeps you shadow flawless and in place for DAYS even after a shower.
customer_reviews.author: keloqura

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: love this product , i am very pleased . fast delivery .
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: I won't be using anything else
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with this Too Faced primer; the only ones I have to compare it to are Urban Decay's Orginal Potion Primer and Elizabeth Arden's Eye-Fix Primer. With the latter two, my eyeshadow slid around and by the end of the day, all the colors on the lid were mixed together; Too Faced is the only one that worked. Also, it's liquidy, which is what I prefer, as you don't need much to cover the eye. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well but could use an applicator
customer_reviews.text: This eye shadow primer / base works fantastic. My shadow goes on nice and stays where I put it. Urban Decay works well, too. I do have to use a Q-tip to put it on though. Unlike Urban Decay, Too Faced does not come with any type of applicator and the only way I can get it all across my eye lid is with the Q-tip. It comes just in a plain tube. I should note that Too Faced is quite a bit cheaper than Urban Decay. I'll stick with Too Faced.
customer_reviews.author: VixterK

customer_reviews.title: sufficient?
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression that this was a miracle product at the time of purchase, however, upon using it daily over the span of the past few weeks I'm left only moderately satisfied. I don't have oily skin, and I'm pretty sure I'm applying it correctly, but it just doesn't want to work well for me. It does help retain color, however, my eyeliner (which is black eyeshadow) creases as badly as it always has. If I buy this again, it will probably be after I forget how unnecessary it is, but definitely not because it earned by loyalty or something. :-( Way too expensive for the quality (or lack thereof).
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Great eyelid primer
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Spreads on evenly, dries in a couple of minutes. Make a great, colorless primer for my makeup with no tell-tale lines of demarcation. Does not compete with the eyeshadow for color, like some.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, makes eye makeup look more polished, stay fresher looking, and stay on longer.
customer_reviews.author: T.L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love how this extends eyeshadow and prevents it from melting into the ceases.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great eye primer
customer_reviews.text: This product helps keep my eye shadow on all day. Price on Amazon less than at Sephora or Ulta.
customer_reviews.author: Diane K

customer_reviews.title: works pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I wanted urban decays eye potion primer,which rocks! But I got this instead since it had good reviews and wasn't uber expensive. It works pretty well to keep my shadow on and from creasing or smudging, even when I'm outside in a hot muggy climate for hours on end. Make sure to wait about a minute after application before putting eye shadow on though. Also its nice that a little tiny bit goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This primer blended in well, but did not prevent creases at all. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Mountain Mama

customer_reviews.title: Smelled bad, likely expired
customer_reviews.text: Mine seemed to be genuine and not a fake. However, it smelled terrible, so I suspect it was expired/very old. I ended up throwing it away and not using it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Excellent poduct
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after a recommendation from a friend and it does exactly we it says it will do.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Z.

customer_reviews.title: Not Insured.
customer_reviews.text: I ought to get my insurance money since my eye makeup melted off my face! I guess my eyelids are still too oily that this product won't save my eye shadow. Wicked bummer. I don't think this product does anything for my eyes other than making it a light beige and tint my eyelashes that color too (it's unpleasant). 2 stars because I like the company's ethics. I guess I'll go try out Urban Decay's Primer Potion!
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I've always had greasy eyelids and have never been able to wear eye shadow without it creasing until now. I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sally Hutson

customer_reviews.title: Really like it!
customer_reviews.text: After thinking about it and considering the product for forever I finally took the plunge and bought it. I must say I REALLY like it! It does what it claims: keeps your eye shadow in place all day long without fading and dramatically creasing. It also makes the color go on much better. All you need is a tiny dab. A little goes a long way and I don't wear makeup everyday so I know this tube will last forever! Get it!
customer_reviews.author: The Girl

customer_reviews.title: Best Anti-Crease
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for a number of years and never disappointed. Keeps my eye shadow looking like I just put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Proud Nana

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It does exactly what it says it will do.
customer_reviews.author: R3Tx

customer_reviews.title: The sample was fantastic. So I ordered a full size tube
customer_reviews.text: First tried this product as a sample included with an eye shadow palette. The sample was fantastic. So I ordered a full size tube. It's nothing like the sample. Helps a little with the impact of the color. Does zero to help, much less prevent, creasing.
customer_reviews.author: Steph M

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and as described. Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than what I was using!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading lots of positive reviews. I am very pleased with this product. I totally noticed my eyeshadow lasting ALL DAY and looking really fresh even though I hadn't touched it in hours. A little goes a long way so I feel like the price was well worth it. I was using e.l.f. primer and so this is a huge step forward for me and for $7 more it was so much better quality! A good buy!
customer_reviews.author: coffeefirstthing

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love this product. I work long days and i end the day with no crease on my eyelid and the shadow looks fresh!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Had to throughout after 5 uses.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product 5 times before I had to through it out because it gave me a rash on my eyelids every time. Which really sucks because it made my eyeshadow look amazing! I must be allergic to an ingredient...😕
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: A MUST
customer_reviews.text: HOLY GRAIL PRODUCT. My eyeshadow and eyeliner stay in tact all day long and even after a crazy sweaty day at the gym!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. I have nothing to compare it to, but it worked well all day. Easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: cat

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: This may just be a bad choice for me. When I used it the formula makes my eye lids oily. This created creases in my eye shadow over time. I got the urban decay one at the same time and I prefer that one. I don’t get weird creases and it last all day.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Baka

customer_reviews.title: COUNTERFEIT, do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Not the real deal. Messy when opened, different formula, different tip.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it a zero I would. It is cakey before you even put on shadow.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Rimmer

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after my daughter raved about it, saying it kept her eye shadow in tact the entire day. She said her eye shadow looked the same at the end of the day as when she applied it. I don't find it to be much different than what I was using before. However, my daughter said she was using Too Faced eye shadow as well, which I do not. Perhaps that makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: Great service!
customer_reviews.text: Received item in no time! I've been using this product for years and I will NOT put eye shadow on without it. I've tried urban decay but it was too greasy for me. The too faced is greasy but thats why you have to shake it up and it comes out whole. Thank you very much seller! I will definitely buy from you again!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Crochet

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply and really keeps your eyeshadow from creasing or fading!
customer_reviews.author: Darla Dumas

customer_reviews.title: I swear by this!
customer_reviews.text: I swear by this product. I’ve been using it for years. Keeps my eyeshadow perfect all day long!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Like it looks like the grease that came off a ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I wish I could give this zero stars. It did not work. It came out greasy. Like it looks like the grease that came off a pizza. Please becarful purchasing this.
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: FAKE!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a fake! First of all, mine came only half full. Secondly, the packaging is different and the layout on the front is off center. The consistency of the primer itself is also different. I am in the process of obtaining a full refund. I also compared this product with the one I currently have (that is almost gone, hence attempting to order more) and when placed side by side it is obvious that this is a counterfeit product. Who knows what is in this primer!!! This is dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Judi B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite eyeshadow base. Keeps my eyeshadow on all day.
customer_reviews.author: Anna M Holstrom

customer_reviews.title: Creased on me
customer_reviews.text: This didn't keep my shadow from creasing at all. I have normal to dry skin. I tried using less, I tried using more. It's just not for me. I have a full tube sitting in one of my makeup drawers waiting til I pass it on to a friend. I didn't feel like my shadow was as vibrant as when I use my MAC paint pot, sad cause this stuff is a wee pricey
customer_reviews.author: charles carpenter

customer_reviews.title: RECCOMEND!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE IT. GREAT PRICE. WORKS. DONT CREASE EVEN WHEN SLEPT IN.. THE NEXT MORNING MY MAKEUP LOOKED GREAT . CREAMY... A LITTLE GREASY IF U DONT USE IT OFTEN BUT IF U PUSH IT AROUND IT GETS ITS CONSISTANCY BACK, I THINKT HATS THE SETTLING OF THE PRODUCT. BUT IT DEF WORKS. FAST FAST FAST SHIPPING WILL ORDER AGAIN!!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Miami Heat

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Use this everyday day. Works great, I have hooded eyes so getting eyeshadow to stay put is hard. With this it stays where I put it.
customer_reviews.author: dayna stithem

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Just for the record, this is Shawn's wife reviewing this, not Shawn. This works so great! I have never before had my eye shadow last ALL DAY!!! This really makes it last - by the end of the day there is very moderate creasing, but the rest still looks great! I LOVE this stuff - works best when you allow it to dry before applying shadow.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Great primer
customer_reviews.text: I love this primer, works well for everyday makeup and special occasions. Lasts really long. I have been using this product for years and I have tried others but this is just my go to. I love most product I purchased by too faced. The primer itself lasts really long and you don't need much so be careful to not squeeze the tube to hard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonlover79

customer_reviews.title: A great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for an eye shadow primer and bought a Bobbi Brown product that was thick and cakey. This product is just what I wanted. It goes on very smoothly and you just use a small amount. My eyeliner and shadow looked much better with this product and it stayed on without creasing all day. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: They were both very good, about the same as far as how well ...
customer_reviews.text: I've always used Nars or Urban decay eye shadow primers.. They were both very good, about the same as far as how well they work. Decided to try this one because I like 'two faced" products and this stuff is WAY better!! eye shadow stays put for over 14 hours...SUPER impressed with this one!! Try it, you won't be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Debra A. Young

customer_reviews.title: Not so great for my skin
customer_reviews.text: Though this is perfect for some people, it's very drying. I put it on over a water-base moisturizer, and that helped, but it was still very dry and made my eyelids look like crepe paper. I think it would be perfect for a very young person who also has oily eyelids. One plus is that it truly will hold your shadow until you remove it with a remover.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do what it says it will, and unreturnable
customer_reviews.text: Is oily, perhaps it is so old that it has separated ? Makes eye shadow crease and rub off And unreturnable !
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great product, and the price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.text: After looking at and trying several different eye primers (my eyelids are VERY oily), I think I've finally found one that I like and that I can actually afford. I wouldn't say this performs any miracles, but my eyeshadow generally stays in place without much creasing when I wear the primer, even after 11-hour days at work. I do have a little bit of creasing if I've been wearing shadow all day, but like I said, my eyelids are above-average oily, and they look MUCH better if I have applied the primer before my shadow in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other eye shadow primers before and this one by far is the best! Your eye makeup stays on perfectly all day and even if you sleep with it (it happens) you'll be shocked at how perfect it still is in the morning, eye liner and all! I even put it under my eyebrows (i have to really fill them in) and it helps greatly with that too! I will use this forever!
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I love this eye primer, it really lasts and was priced the best, I will reorder from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Debra H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is great! No creasing and keeps eye shadow in place till I take it off..
customer_reviews.author: D.  Hornsby

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work long
customer_reviews.text: I have very oily eyelids and have had a very hard time finding an eye shadow or primer that would stay on for more than a couple of hours. This worked for about 4 hours before it creased. Purchased NYX HD Eye shadow Primer and my eye shadow stays on ALL DAY LONG!
customer_reviews.author: melody bailey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for oily skin! No creasing!
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely oily skin and I was never able to wear eyeshadow because it would crease within a couple of hours. This stuff is perfect if you have oily skin and creasing problems. Lasts you ALL DAY with no creasing or clumping!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dwag

customer_reviews.title: Kind of greasy
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really a huge fan of this primer. It does make eyeshadows look brighter and last longer, but it often separates in the tube into the pigment (or whatever the tan part is) and oil. This primer is often too greasy for me, and it's gross when it separates (so you have to knead the tube before use); the separation isn't because I've had the product too long- it did that a week after I opened the brand new package. I also have really pale skin, and I find that if I get any primer above my crease, it looks yellow and cakey.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Finally my eyeshadow stays put, awesome. I use very small amount on each lid/below the brow bone, a little under the lower eyelash line, a very thin layer, then let it dry for a couple of seconds, and then apply and blend mineral shadows on top.
customer_reviews.author: Therewolf

customer_reviews.title: This little tube will last a pretty decent amount of time
customer_reviews.text: I apply this with a q-tip and it does what it is meant to do. I have had to use this as a glitter glue in an emergency, and it doubled as that as well. This little tube will last a pretty decent amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, helps eye makeup stay all day. Crease free on wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S

customer_reviews.title: Makes a difference, but not for long
customer_reviews.text: Wearing this primer definitely makes a difference for a couple of hours, but eventually my eyeshadow begins to rub off and crease. Will probably try something else next time. It may just be impossible to find anything worthwhile since I live in central Florida where it's humid 24/7 and I have oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: A. Carlton

customer_reviews.title: Fake product
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure this was a knock off. Very disappointed the consistency is wrong. Doesn't last very long. Your makeup will flake off.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin v.

customer_reviews.title: Not Much Better Than Cheaper Drugstore Brands
customer_reviews.text: Like many folks, I sometimes buy products based on positive reviews. This time, the product didn't live up to my expectations. I'd been looking for an eye makeup base that works better and lasts longer than drugstore brands (such as Almay Bright Eyes). My face is oily, even around the eyes, so it's hard to have fresh-looking makeup for more than a couple of hours. I applied Shadow Insurance according to directions, but after a few hours my eye shadow and liner began to crease and run as usual. While I don't regret buying Shadow Insurance, next time I'll try a new beauty product in person before buying it online.
customer_reviews.author: Ventura Lady

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Your Shadow in Place
customer_reviews.text: I was using Urban Decay make-up which was slightly pricier than this brand, but I think I like Too Faced even better now. The products go on great. They come in really cute vintage looking packaging and the convince of getting them through Amazon is great!!!
customer_reviews.author: mskolnik1992

customer_reviews.title: Can cause an allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: I had an allergic reaction on my eyelids. Which has never happened with previous products. Caused a burning sensation and a red rash.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Mary McGregor

customer_reviews.title: I love this primer
customer_reviews.text: You can NEVER go wrong with any Two Faced Cosmetics. I love this primer! Not ideal for glitters and such but I use it daily for mattes and smokey eyes. It brings out all the colors in a smokey eye and holds the shade down for hours!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M

product_meta.title: Too Faced Shadow Insurance Anti-Crease Eye Shadow Primer 0.35 OZ
product_meta.description: Size:0.35 Fl OzYour full-coverage insurance policy against all fading, creasing, melting, blurring, oil slicked andhard-to-blend eye-shadow accidents. Our silicone based eye-shadow primer transforms any eyeshadow into a perfectly blendable, color-drenched, intensified version of its self, then locks it downperfectly ‘till you take it off. Our skin soothing formula evens out the skin tone on your lids andsmoothes out lines while it secures a barrier between the oils of your skin and your makeup, so noshadow catastrophes will ever happen again. "Thank you Shadow Insurance, I can sleep better atnight knowing you're on my side!"-
feature_bullets: No smudging, creasing, melting or fading
Eye brow products stay on all day
Apply a drop and blend evenly from lashes to brows before all shadow applications
Use this with any eye shadow you own to lock down your color
